name: 張文中
objective: Modern control theory mainly focuses on linear system analysis and design.  This is the course where students from a variety of backgrounds begin to acquire the mathematical tools used in research literature involving linear systems.  The core material covered in this course is the theory of time-varying linear systems, in both continuous-time and discrete-time, with frequent specialization to the time invariant case.

16	State feedback

PS: The contents and order of lectures and presentations will be adjusted according to actual needs
scorePolicy: The final grade will be a weighted average of homework (including quizzes) 20%, midterm 25%, paper presentation and report 25%, and final examination 30%.
materials: Linear System Theory and Design - Fourth Edition, Chi-Tsong Chen, Oxford University Press, 2012
